problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠BAC = N_0, AD ⊥ BC at D, if AB = N_1, AC = N_2, then the value of sin∠DAC is ()
raw_answer:
解:在△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,AB=3,AC=4,
由勾股定理BC=√{AB^{2}+_{AC^{2}}}=5,
由面积公式得AB•AC=AD•BC,∴AD=\frac{12}{5},∴CD=√{AC^{2}-AD^{2}}=3.2,∴sin∠DAC=\frac{DC}{AC}=0.8=\frac{4}{5}．
故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了锐角三角函数的定义以及直角三角形的性质,解体的关键是牢记定义和性质,并能熟练运用．
